descript.abstract: Cuba Social Census Data (Province), 2012 is a polygon theme representing Provinces (1st level administrative units) in Cuba as of 2012. Attribute data include summary results of the 2012 Cuban census questions regarding education and disability characteristics. The documentation of these variables can be found in the "Social" section from the accompanying code book. This dataset is part of Cuba 2012 Census collection.

enttyp.enttypd: File Geodatabase representing census sectors and associated attribute tables.
